thread.title: Roger Kearnes
thread.title_full: Precision Tax Relief reviewed by Roger Kearnes

author: Roger Kearnes
title: Roger Kearnes
text: I was in a bind with a tax issue I was able to get a hold of the office of Precision Tax Relief and they were on top of my situation stopping my Liens and garnishments and working with the IRS to make a affordable plan to get this paid off and the IRS off my back. They assigned me two agent's right away London and Joshua they were very HELPFUL and great negotiating skills with the IRS now I can sleep with ease and with no worries.
